posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase early baseball cabinet photos. Teams, individual players, in uniform or in street clothes. If you have something interesting, please send me a private message. 

Thanks. 

Ethan

posts.post_title: E-mail me regarding a couple unknown cabinets.
posts.post_content:
Ethan,

    I have a couple unknown baseball cabinets which I doubt were major leaguers. If interested, drop me a note at [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].

Thank you,

Brian Van Horn
